successes.title: Kano: A computer anyone can make
successes.description: A computer and coding kit for all ages, all over the world. Simple as Lego, powered by Pi. Make games, learn code, create the future.

Pledges.description: Thanks and Love – You get both, plus downloads of the Kano BOOKS, OS, and PROJECTS. Plus, we'll put your name in our source code.

Swag –
You get the awesome judo T-SHIRT, as well as all of the above digital goodness and source-code shoutout. All shirt sizes, including kids', available. Plus, you get STICKERS!
[add $10 for delivery]

Swag – You get the awesome judo T-SHIRT, as well as all of the above digital goodness and source-code shoutout. All shirt sizes, including kids', available. Plus, you get STICKERS! [INCLUDES WORLDWIDE SHIPPING]
Kano Christmas Special - a perfect pack for people who already have a Raspberry Pi.
You get beautifully-printed Kano Books, filled with six awesome levels and dozens of projects -- plus an SD card with a limited edition pre-release of the Kano OS.
Includes worldwide delivery and all shipped in time for Christmas!

Kano Keyboard Combo (KS exclusive) – You get the KANO KEYBOARD. Looks sweet, wireless, onboard multitouch trackpad, independent mouse clicks – ideal for Python or Minecraft. You'll also get downloads of the BOOKS, the OS, and your name in our SOURCE CODE.
[add $15 for delivery]

Kano Keyboard Combo (KS exclusive) – You get the KANO KEYBOARD. Looks sweet, wireless, onboard multitouch trackpad, independent mouse clicks – ideal for Python or Minecraft. You'll also get downloads of the BOOKS, the OS, and your name in our SOURCE CODE. [INCLUDES WORLDWIDE SHIPPING]
GET KANO (earliest bird special) – You get your KIT a month before everyone else, assembled with love by us. As a true playa, we'll send you a T-SHIRT and all the swag rewards too.
As an early bird, you'll also get extra-special SOURCE CODE recognition (with judo belt), a direct line to us for any cool powerups you want next. [add $20 for delivery]

GET KANO (early bird special) – You get a KANO KIT, the first computer that you make yourself – fun, simple, and for everyone. First, build a Raspberry Pi system and a sweet speaker, then design your own case. Next, bring them to life – talk to your computer, create games and music, start coding, compete with friends, and unlock new powers. All kit backers get unique SOURCE CODE recognition, with the judo face badge. [add $20 for delivery]
